inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"WVDErrors
{wvd_displayserviceerrors}
| parse _ResourceId with * "/hostpools/" HostPoolName
| where HostPoolName like ('{HostPool}')
| summarize usercount = count(UserName) by CodeSymbolic, CorrelationId, TimeGenerated
| project CodeSymbolic, usercount, CorrelationId, TimeGenerated
| sort by usercount desc","size":1,"title":"WVD Errors","noDataMessage":"No errors detected in the selected time period","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"piechart"}

Subscription.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

SubscriptionID.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend FullName = strcat(HostPool, "/", Computer)
| where FullName in (WVDHosts)
| where InstanceName != "_Total"
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, Computer","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"% Processor Time by Process","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"linechart"}

Subscription.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

SubscriptionID.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend FullName = strcat(HostPool, "/", Computer)
| where FullName in (WVDHosts)
| where InstanceName != "_Total"
| where ObjectName == "Process" and CounterName == "% User Time"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), InstanceName, Computer
","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"% User Time by Process","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"linechart"}

Subscription.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Processor" and CounterName == "% Processor Time"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer, InstanceName ","size":1,"aggregation":3,"title":"Processor % Processor Time per host","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"timechart","chartSettings":{"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true,"maximumFractionDigits":1}},"max":100}}}

Subscription.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

SubscriptionID.labelValue: Visual Studio Enterprise Subscription – MPN - Matt

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let WVDHosts = dynamic([{WVDHosts}]);
Perf
| extend HostPool = '{HostPool}'
| extend HostPool = strcat(HostPool, "/")
| extend Computername = strcat(HostPool, Computer)
| where Computername in (WVDHosts)
| where ObjectName == "Memory" and CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use"
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer","size":1,"aggregation":3,"title":"Memory % Committed bytes in use per Host","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"timechart","chartSettings":{"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":1,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true,"maximumFractionDigits":1}},"max":100}}}
